name: RSI (Relative Strength Index)
description: Uses RSI to identify overbought and oversold conditions. Buys when RSI is oversold, sells when overbought.
author: StratCraft

parameters.name: tradeSizeRatio
parameters.label: Trade Size Ratio
parameters.description: Percentage of portfolio to use for each trade (e.g., 0.002 = 0.2%)

parameters.name: minimumTradeSize
parameters.label: Minimum Trade Size ($)
parameters.description: Minimum dollar value per trade. Orders smaller than this threshold are rounded up or skipped.

parameters.name: sellFraction
parameters.label: Sell Fraction
parameters.description: Fraction of the position to close when a sell signal is generated (0 = none, 1 = full position only)

parameters.name: allowShortSelling
parameters.label: Enable Short Selling
parameters.description: Set to 1 to allow strategies to enter short positions on sell signals (0 = disabled).

parameters.name: buyDiscountRatio
parameters.label: Buy Discount %
parameters.description: Buy only when price is below a certain discount from a baseline (e.g., 0.05 = 5% discount)

parameters.name: maxHoldingDays
parameters.label: Maximum Holding Days
parameters.description: Maximum number of days to hold a trade before forced closure

parameters.name: volLookback
parameters.label: Volatility Lookback (days)
parameters.description: Lookback window for realized volatility estimate

parameters.name: atrPeriod
parameters.label: ATR Period
parameters.description: ATR lookback period for ATR-based stops

parameters.name: minConfidence
parameters.label: Minimum Confidence
parameters.description: Minimum confidence level to execute trades (0-1)

exampleUsage: Use RSI 14 with 30/70 levels for standard overbought/oversold signals.
